main event: A silver ball moved slowly over Pine Castle Air Force Base, accelerated rapidly, and disappeared from sight.
interesting points: The object was first sighted moving very slowly, then it accelerated very rapidly and ascended at a 25-30 degree angle before disappearing to the east.
The object appeared to be a solid silver ball about the size of a car tire.
The sighting lasted for about 1 minute.
No sound or visible exhaust was reported from the object.
The object made a sharp climbing maneuver before disappearing at an estimated altitude of 25,000-30,000 feet.
location: Pine Castle Air Force Base, Florida
